short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds color-scheme light dark meta tag to allow UI elements to match OS theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forces UI elements such as scrollbars and form fields to match either your operating system's theme, or your own theme by choice, light or dark.
